name: Awoken - A Vignette
description:
Awoken from Cryogenic stasis, on a 30 year journey to find fresh hope on a new planet, Bryn Briar suddenly awakens, cold and alone.

The player will guide Bryn to regain the memories of her family and make a decision that will change their lives forever.

This short narrative adventure was made for Kodamajam 1 (8/11/19 – 29/11/19) following the theme of “An Isolated World”. This was made by JimmyMcGinger & November152.
